org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.scheduler

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.scheduler.Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstanceListener, SlotAvailablilityListener

    public class Scheduler
extends Object
implements InstanceListener, SlotAvailablilityListener
    The scheduler is responsible for distributing the ready-to-run tasks and assigning them to instances and slots.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts the scheduler down. After shut down no more tasks can be added to the scheduler.

      • getNumberOfAvailableSlots

        public int getNumberOfAvailableSlots()
        NOTE: In the presence of multi-threaded operations, this number may be inexact.
        Returns:
        The number of empty slots, for tasks.

      • getTotalNumberOfSlots

        public int getTotalNumberOfSlots()

                                    throws NoResourceAvailableException
        Throws:
        NoResourceAvailableException

      • getFreeSlotForTask

        protected AllocatedSlot getFreeSlotForTask(ExecutionVertex vertex,
                                           Iterable<Instance> requestedLocations)
        Gets a suitable instance to schedule the vertex execution to.

        NOTE: This method does is not thread-safe, it needs to be synchronized by the caller.

        Parameters:
        vertex - The task to run.
        Returns:
        The instance to run the vertex on, it null, if no instance is available.

      • newSlotAvailable
